scripts.server: cd server && node -r dotenv/config server.js dotenv_config_path=../.env
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:client && npm run docs:build && npm run build:server && npm run build:config && npm run build:contents
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && mkdir -p ../dist/public && cp -r dist/* ../dist/public/
scripts.build:server: mkdir -p dist/server && cp -r server/*.js dist/server/ && cp server/*.cjs dist/server/ && cp server/package.json dist/server/ && cp -r server/adapters dist/server/
scripts.build:config: cp package.json dist/ && npm run build:dotenv
scripts.build:dotenv: [ -f .env ] && cp .env dist/ || echo 'No .env file found, skipping'
scripts.build:package: cd dist && npm install --production && cd server && npm install --production
scripts.start: cd server && node -r dotenv/config server.js dotenv_config_path=../.env
scripts.prod:build: npm run build && npm run build:package
scripts.prod:deploy: npm run prod:build && npm run start:prod
scripts.docker:test:linux: docker run --rm -it -p 3000:3000 -v "$(pwd)/dist-bin:/app" -w /app -e OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_api_key -e ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=your_anthropic_api_key -e GOOGLE_API_KEY=your_google_api_key --platform linux/amd64 node:20-slim /bin/bash -c "chmod +x /app/ai-hub-apps-v1.0.5-linux && /app/ai-hub-apps-v1.0.5-linux"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:openai && npm run test:mistral && npm run test:anthropic && npm run test:google
